citation.article-title: Reclassification of Desulfobacterium phenolicum as Desulfobacula phenolica comb. nov. and description of strain SaxT as Desulfotignum balticum gen. nov., sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Desulfobacula (Rabus et al. 1993)
The description of the genus Desulfobacula is the same as that given by Rabus et al. (1993) except that the oval cells may be motile or non-motile.
